attributes.action: ALLOW SCOTLAND AND ENGLAND TO HAVE DIFFERENT TIME ZONES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: AS QUEENSLAND AND NSW IN AUSTRALIA ARRANGE THEIR TIME ZONES SO SHOULD WE. ENGLAND MAINTAINING BST WHILE ALLOWING SCOTLAND TO ADOPT GMT IN WINTER IF THEY SO WISH.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
